precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'Start' button on the left side of the taskbar.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
expected_results: The mouse cursor will move slightly to the right of the 'Start' button.

precondition: The Windows XP desktop is visible.
The Windows XP Start Menu is open.
expected_results: The Start Menu will close and the Windows XP Control Panel window will open to the "Pick a category" view.

precondition: The Control Panel is open and displaying categories.
action: Click the "Switch to Classic View" link located below the address bar.
expected_results: The Control Panel will switch to the Classic View, and the link will change to "Switch to Category View".

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is displayed in Classic View.
expected_results: No visible change will occur in the UI.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is visible.
action: Press the 'p' key, followed by the 'o' key.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will be brought to the foreground and become the active window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Turn off hard disks" setting is selected.
expected_results: The "Turn off hard disks" setting will be changed to "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Turn off hard disks" option should be visible within the "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section.
action: Click the dropdown button next to the "Turn off hard disks" option.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear with various time options and a "Never" option.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off hard disks" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close and "Never" will be displayed as the selected option for the "Turn off hard disks" setting.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open, and the "Power Schemes" tab is active.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and in Classic View.
action: Hover the mouse pointer over the icon labeled "Display".
expected_results: A tooltip with the text "Display" will appear next to the mouse cursor.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is visible.
expected_results: The "Screen Saver" tab will become active, displaying options for configuring the screen saver.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab of the 'Display Properties' window is open. The 'Screen saver' dropdown menu displays 'Windows XP'.
action: Click the down arrow of the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A list of available screen savers will appear, with 'Windows XP' still selected.

precondition: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu within the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "None" option in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "Screen saver" dropdown menu will show "None" as the selected option. The screen saver preview will change to a blank screen.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' window is open, showing the 'Screen Saver' tab.
The Windows XP Control Panel window is open.
action: Click the 'Close' button in the upper right corner of the 'Control Panel' window.
